triggered_rules.explanation: This document was registered on 15-Aug-2024 (Independence Day), which is a gazetted holiday. Registrations on gazetted holidays require an additional fee of ₹5,000 under OTHER_FEE. The OTHER_FEE field is ₹0 and no payment matching the holiday fee was found in CASH_PAID records. The expected payable should be ₹1,25,900 but only ₹1,20,900 was charged and collected, resulting in a revenue gap of ₹5,000.

mv_evidence.note: Market value matches rate card. No MV deviation.

exemption_evidence.note: No exemption claimed for this document.

suggested_actions.likely_cause: Holiday registration fee of ₹5,000 was not added to OTHER_FEE for a registration on a gazetted holiday (Independence Day).
recommended_checks: Verify registration date 15-Aug-2024 against holiday calendar.
Check if holiday fee was collected separately outside the system.
Confirm no Account Code 59 (User Charges) payment exists.
Issue demand notice to registrant for ₹5,000.
